name: zolid-frontend
description: ZOLID Frontend Monorepo - Landing, Artisan PWA, Client PWA

scripts.dev:landing: npm run generate-sw && npm run dev --workspace=@zolid/landing
scripts.dev:artisan: npm run generate-sw && npm run dev --workspace=@zolid/artisan
scripts.dev:client: npm run generate-sw && npm run dev --workspace=@zolid/client
scripts.dev:admin: npm run generate-sw && npm run dev --workspace=@zolid/admin
scripts.build:landing: npm run generate-sw && npm run build --workspace=@zolid/landing
scripts.build:artisan: npm run generate-sw && npm run build --workspace=@zolid/artisan
scripts.build:client: npm run generate-sw && npm run build --workspace=@zolid/client
scripts.build:admin: npm run generate-sw && npm run build --workspace=@zolid/admin
scripts.build:all: npm run generate-sw && npm run build --workspaces
